critique: The document aims to evoke joy and hope by addressing the failures of the public education system and promising to empower parents with educational choices. It also acknowledges the sadness and frustration felt by families due to the current system's shortcomings. There might be a hint of disgust towards the failing public education system. Surprise is not a primary emotion being conveyed. Fear and anger are not explicitly intended, but might be felt by those who oppose the policy.
